data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yasunaga, Tomohide, Duwal, Ram Keshari (2016): Three new species of the ant-mimetic plant bug genus Pilophorus from Japan (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Phylinae: Pilophorini). Zootaxa 4117 (2): 172-182, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4117.2.2
